text: The Naypyidaw Development Committee (; abbreviated NPTDC) is the administrative body of Naypyidaw, the administrative capital of Myanmar (Burma). NPTDC is separate from the Naypyidaw Council. ==History== NPTDC was established by State Peace and Development Council, under the Nay Pyi Taw Development Law, which was issued on 29 December 2009. Consisting of 5 to 9 members, it is led by a Chairman who acts as the Mayor, and a Vice-Chairman who acts as the Vice-Mayor. ==See also== *Naypyidaw *Mandalay City Development Committee *Yangon City Development Committee *Myanmar International Convention Centre 2 ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Government agencies of Myanmar Category:Naypyidaw
title: Naypyidaw Development Committee
